long_description: The Pediped Amazon sandals outfit your little girl for all sorts of sun-filled adventures. Water-safe nubuck leather uppers feature synthetic webbing accents; rip-and-stick straps secure the fit; rubber toe caps protect little feet. Neoprene linings wrap around feet for a secure fit, and dry quickly after water play. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Rubber outsoles offer a secure grip on varied terrain. Machine washable for easy care.
short_description: The Pediped Amazon sandals outfit your little girl for all sorts of sun-filled adventures.
